resources.string: "Please enter you email address bellow and we will send you instruction to reset your password."
"Staff FinderÂ® has 4'000 temporary jobs between about 30'000 registered employees and 1'500 registered employers. 98% of the jobs are filled within 4 hours"
"Swiss passport or work permit is required"
"%1$s can not be shorter than %2$d characters"
"%1$s can not be longer than %2$d characters"
"%1$s must be within the range %2$d and %3$d"
"You have registered. Please login to enter."
"Please check your email for further instructions."
"Are you sure you want to log out?"
"Here goes description, telling you why it's important to have a business portrait picture"
"Here goes description, telling you why it's important to have a business whole body picture"
"Here goes description, telling you why it's important to have a casual portrait picture"
"Here goes description, telling you why it's important to have a casual whole body picture"
"Cannot connect to server, please try again later"
"Request cannot be executed, please try again later"
"You are not authenticated, please enter valid login and password"
"File too big, should be less then 3 MB"
"Invalid data received, please try again later"
"Something goes wrong, please contact system administrator"
"Email already registered, please enter another one."
"Your account is not activated yet. Your account must be activated for this process"
"%1$s must contain at least one lowercase letter"
"%1$s must contain at least one uppercase letter"
"You must be at least 18 years old"
"You must be younger to work with us"
"Can't set profile picture. Try again later"
"Can't delete profile picture. Try again later"
"Are you responsible for maintenance towards children?"
"Are you receiving unemployment benefits at the moment?"
"Are you receiving pension (OASI/DI) at the moment?"
"Can't create photo, check available space and try again."
"Are you sure you want to replace ID copy?"
"Please download document to preview and open."
"Can't update job profile status. Try again later."
"Selected job profile not found. Please update you data."
"User photo can't be saved, please check free space."
"Photo can't be uploaded. Try again later."
"Now you can lean back, the employer is informed. We will let you know, when you're hired."
"This request will be deleted, you can not recover it. Are you sure?"
"This job can't be accepted. Please try another one."
"Some profile attributes required to accept this job. Would you like to fill them in or decline job?"
"Following attributes should be provided to accept the job: %1$s Would you like to fill them in or decline job?"
"Add at least one job profile to continue."
